create_group.comment: group to keep track of all Named Objects (for future Force-Updates of Non-Dynamic Names)
group to keep track of all Named Objects which have Dnamic Name Parts (to handle update Signals)

show_notification.text: 'Advanced Renaming detected that the Player Faction Tag Mod is also present.\nBoth can be used to add a Faction Tag to all Player Property.\nSo its recommended you remove/disable one of them.'

check_value.comment: check if custom file is present

do_if.comment: check if the Object is really owned by the player and if custom file is present

event_object_signalled.comment: for Update Signalling from other Scripts

do_if.value: event.param == 'Subordinates Name Updated' or event.param == 'Subordinates Name Updated - bigships' or event.param == 'Subordinates Name Updated - smallships'

replace.with: ( if $subordinates.count ge 100 and $i lt 100 then {5554302,122} else '' ) + ( if $subordinates.count ge 10 and $i lt 10 then {5554302,122} else '' ) + $i

do_if.comment: If the set Name is empty - use/re-set default name according to custom file

check_value.comment: only update when Custom (User) Version file is present and has changed

do_if.value: $keys? or $nameA? or $nameB? or $cargotype? or $type? or $scriptset? or $debug?

debug_text.text: 'Internally used Vars in Included Actions also used by previous Code: $keys: %1 $nameA: %2 $nameB: %3 $cargotype: %4 $type: %5 $scriptset: %6 $debug: %7 - will be overridden and removed!!'.[@$keys,@$nameA,@$nameB,@$cargotype,@$type,@$scriptset,@$debug]

debug_to_file.text: '[== ERROR ==] Internally used Vars in Included Actions also used by previous Code: $keys: %1 $nameA: %2 $nameB: %3 $cargotype: %4 $type: %5 $scriptset: %6 $debug: %7 - will be overridden and removed!!'.[@$keys,@$nameA,@$nameB,@$cargotype,@$type,@$scriptset,@$debug]
debug_to_file.name: 'Advanced Renaming.txt'

substitute_text.comment: Sequence Numbering Reset (Reset all sequence numbers)
Sequence Numbering Reset (Object Type sequence numbers)
Sequence Numbering Reset (Size/purpose combination sequence numbers - class)

replace.with: ( if player.entity.$sequence_overall ge 100 and $tmp lt 100 then {5554302,122} else '' ) + ( if player.entity.$sequence_overall ge 10 and $tmp lt 10 then {5554302,122} else '' ) + $tmp

( if player.entity.$sequence_type.{$object.macro} ge 100 and $tmp lt 100 then {5554302,122} else '' ) + ( if player.entity.$sequence_type.{$object.macro} ge 10 and $tmp lt 10 then {5554302,122} else '' ) + $tmp

( if player.entity.$sequence_size.{$object.class} ge 100 and $tmp lt 100 then {5554302,122} else '' ) + ( if player.entity.$sequence_size.{$object.class} ge 10 and $tmp lt 10 then {5554302,122} else '' ) + $tmp

( if player.entity.$sequence_purpose.{$object.primarypurpose} ge 100 and $tmp lt 100 then {5554302,122} else '' ) + ( if player.entity.$sequence_purpose.{$object.primarypurpose} ge 10 and $tmp lt 10 then {5554302,122} else '' ) + $tmp

if $object.pilot.exists then ( '' + $object.pilot.skill.{$object.pilot.type.skilltypes.{1}} + ( if $object.pilot.type.skilltypes.{2}? then + $object.pilot.skill.{$object.pilot.type.skilltypes.{2}} else '' ) + ( if $object.pilot.type.skilltypes.{3}? then + $object.pilot.skill.{$object.pilot.type.skilltypes.{3}} else '' ) ) else 'null'

if $object.defencenpc.exists then ( '' + $object.defencenpc.skill.{$object.defencenpc.type.skilltypes.{1}} + ( if $object.defencenpc.type.skilltypes.{2}? then + $object.defencenpc.skill.{$object.defencenpc.type.skilltypes.{2}} else '' ) + ( if $object.defencenpc.type.skilltypes.{3}? then + $object.defencenpc.skill.{$object.defencenpc.type.skilltypes.{3}} else '' ) ) else 'null'

if $object.engineer.exists then ( '' + $object.engineer.skill.{$object.engineer.type.skilltypes.{1}} + ( if $object.engineer.type.skilltypes.{2}? then + $object.engineer.skill.{$object.engineer.type.skilltypes.{2}} else '' ) + ( if $object.engineer.type.skilltypes.{3}? then + $object.engineer.skill.{$object.engineer.type.skilltypes.{3}} else '' ) ) else 'null'

if $object.tradenpc.exists then ( '' + $object.tradenpc.skill.{$object.tradenpc.type.skilltypes.{1}} + ( if $object.tradenpc.type.skilltypes.{2}? then + $object.tradenpc.skill.{$object.tradenpc.type.skilltypes.{2}} else '' ) + ( if $object.tradenpc.type.skilltypes.{3}? then + $object.tradenpc.skill.{$object.tradenpc.type.skilltypes.{3}} else '' ) ) else 'null'
if $products then if @products.count == 1 then $products.{1} else @$object.products.count else ''

add_to_group.comment: since this code might be included elsewhere refer to this var with mdscript/cue

set_object_name.name: $nameA + '{5554301,2017}'
set_object_name.comment: adding neutral Color Tag at the end

debug_text.text: 'Object not set or Invalid for Included Code $object: %1 - doing nothing!!'.[@$object]

debug_to_file.text: '[== ERROR ==] Object not set or Invalid for Included Code $object: %1 - doing nothing!!'.[@$object]
debug_to_file.name: 'Advanced Renaming.txt'

debug_to_file.text: 'No Unformatted Name Var set on Object: %1 - doing nothing!! (may be caused by a Script Update)'.[@$object]
debug_to_file.name: 'Advanced Renaming.txt'

debug_text.text: @$ware_inList + ': ' + @$TiersByWare.{$ware_inList} + ' (no resources but in resources list of ' + $Ware + ')'

set_value.name: $isLowTier
set_value.exact: waregroup.agricultural.{$Ware}.exists or waregroup.energy.{$Ware}.exists or waregroup.food.{$Ware}.exists or waregroup.gases.{$Ware}.exists or waregroup.ice.{$Ware}.exists or waregroup.minerals.{$Ware}.exists or waregroup.pharmaceutical.{$Ware}.exists or waregroup.water.{$Ware}.exists

do_elseif.comment: Wiki Tier is 5, but its in the hightech group with tier 4
Wiki Tier is 4, but its in the shiptech group with tier 5
